description: GlobalScope used incorrectly for UI-related work, causing memory leaks and crashes. Anti-pattern in Android development.
commonCauses: Database operations in GlobalScope outliving Activity
Network requests in GlobalScope without cancellation
solutions: Replace GlobalScope with viewModelScope or lifecycleScope
Use applicationScope for true app-level work only
Ensure all UI work uses lifecycle-aware scopes
Use WorkManager for background work outliving components
Cancel work appropriately with component lifecycle
Document when GlobalScope is truly needed (rare)
prevention: Never use GlobalScope for Activity/Fragment/ViewModel work
Enable IDE warnings for GlobalScope usage
relatedErrors: Crash from UI update after destroy
